@TexasRadDoc @AnusMeatHole @IEMcElroy @katieromich By not wearing a mask -- in a confined space like a plane -- you are actively endangering the lives of others around you and yourself. Should drunk driving not be a criminal offense? Why is putting laws in place to protect people from a very real danger the wrong direction?

@TrueWordsRSpoke @RonFilipkowski Seriously, I have two teenagers, they wear their mask without us even prompting them.  We just traveled to Europe and we wore them on the plane, wore them at restaurants, wore them site seeing.  No one complained. Vaccinated, and tested multiple times.
So... he got kicked off the plane for refusing to wear a mask now he's threatening the officers if they don't stay 6 feet away https://t.co/rGqFw9BlqG

@BowTiedQuoll there's an old saying that when a plane is going through turbulence and the oxygen masks pop out - you put your mask on first before you help others

if you already have expertise in surfing writing that out is one avenue while you build the others

@Madonna2125 @FoxNews No mask no entry. Fly on a plane, wear a mask the entire flight. Want to go to a movie, or church, or a restaurant, a baseball game? Put on a mask. Want to keep your job? Get the vaccine or quit. Those civil liberties??

@mchooyah @catturd2 Funny how they want you 6 ft apart in the airport yet they pack you in the plane like sardines.  Liberals are serious idiots.  You can smell a fart through my jeans. My jeans are thicker than your mask.  Screw the liberals.  This whole deal is over folks. It’s a FRAUD!!  Wake up!
A viral TikTok said a woman refusing to wear a mask delayed a flight for 3 hours https://t.co/zc6fSIRlFk
Have you seen the guy, on the plane eating his mask? Must be a Trump Guy. 🤷🏻

@sbroderfingert Umm trust the science huh?  This is insane dog whistle, social justice warrior, virtue signaling nonsense.  Plane circulates air at such a high rate that infection spread is limited. Studies have been done. One mask is enough.

@JaneStaiano @PaulChahidi As my American D-I-L says, "We have lost our minds over Covid". They won't let most of us Brits in at all. They won't recognise AZ and a 2 y.o. must take a Covid test and wear a mask on a plane. I think she is right.

@mchooyah Funny thing is a commercial plane has some of if not the best air circulation going.  It’s the “hall monitors” that are so annoying. Yeah got it. Wearing the mask. Quit yelling at me for no reason.
RT @de4570: @mchooyah Love it. Get on plane to Italy everyone must be tested negative but everyone must wear a mask for 10 hours. WTF?

Funny thing tho, i constantly get lectured that I'm rude and "always have to know better" when I point out that someone's doing a shitty thing, like coughing into your hand or wearing a shitty one-layer cotton mask for a 2h long flight in a plane full of people 🙃🙃🙃🙃
RT @de4570: @mchooyah Love it. Get on plane to Italy everyone must be tested negative but everyone must wear a mask for 10 hours. WTF?
@mchooyah No need to yell, simple, If the airline says where the mask, then you agree when you get on the plane to wear a mask. Over.
@mchooyah Love it. Get on plane to Italy everyone must be tested negative but everyone must wear a mask for 10 hours. WTF?

@AndyPan03390600 @cia262 @AllisonPearson Actually no, I'm completely unable to wear a mask. Not going to discuss my medical status on twitter of course but because I'm unable to board a plane had to cancel our holiday again this year. Assure you I'd have done anything to get to Spain!

@K_A_Productions @IEMcElroy @katieromich That's why I refuse to fly until there's a vaccine mandate to get onto a plane.  Because anyone can wear their mask until the plane is well into the air, and then, take it off, and what can you do?

On a plane. Every single day.
